Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Drive, west of the elven Shrine.
Room.LongDescription: The Elven Shrine of Corellon Larethian, the elven god of everthing that is, lies to the west of here. The magnificent Shrine was built centuries ago by the elves who used to live in the area. There are still many elves who follow Larethian's banner, but the number of elves in Oceancrest has diminished over the years.
